thread.title: Leeds boy, 16, dies from stab wound after being attacked on his way home from school
thread.title_full: Leeds boy, 16, dies from stab wound after being attacked on his way home from school

author: ecambridge
title: Leeds boy, 16, dies from stab wound after being attacked on his way home from school
text:
MURDER PROBE Leeds boy, 16, dies from stab wound after being attacked on his way home from school 
A 15-year-old boy has been arrested on suspicion of murder and remains in custody after the death By ELLIE CAMBRIDGE Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A MURDER enquiry is underway after a 16-year-old boy died after he was stabbed on his way home from school. 
The teenager was rushed to hospital after suffering a stab wound just before 4pm this afternoon, but he died a short time later. Not known refer to copyright holder The Harehills Lane area is currently still cordoned off and is likely to remain so as forensic examination continue Not known refer to copyright holder The teenager was rushed to hospital but died a short while later from his inury Not known refer to copyright holder Police have since urged anyone who may have been in the area and saw anyone running to get in touch 
A 15-year-old boy has since been arrested on suspicion of murder and is still in police custody. 
Police have urged anyone with mobile phone footage who may have been in the Harehill Lane area of Leeds at the time to come forward. 
Detective Superintendent Pat Twiggs of Protective Services (Crime) is leading the investigation and appealing for any witnesses or anyone with information to come forward. RELATED STORIES Murder arrest after woman falls to her death from east London apartment Fiancé on trial Who was Helen Bailey? Murdered children's author whose fiance Ian Stewart is accused of her murder notorious murder in oz Who is Joanne Lees? Girlfriend of Outback murder victim Peter Falconio who returned to Australia FACES OF EVIL Chilling deathmasks of Victorian murderers including naked serial killer who terrorised London before Jack the Ripper and raging coachman who mutilated his pregnant mistress BABY DEATH Couple deny murder after their baby daughter was found dead in her pram on London bus writer death riddle Fiancé of murdered kids author claims she was kidnapped by shadowy associates of her ex-husband 
He said: “This tragic incident happened in a busy area at a busy time of day with large numbers of people going about their daily business. 
“I am appealing directly to anyone who witnessed the incident or has information that could help our enquiries to come forward. 
“We are particularly keen to speak to anyone who witnessed anyone running in the area to come forward. Not known refer to copyright holder Officers have also asked for anyone who may have mobile phone footage from around that time in the area to come forward Not known refer to copyright holder 5 A teenager has been arrested on suspicion of murder and remains in custody 
“It is also possible that people may have recorded footage on their mobile phones and I would again encourage those people to come forward.” 
The Harehills Lane area is currently still cordoned off and is likely to remain so as forensic examination continue. 
Anyone with information should ring the police on 101 regarding log 1017 of 10th or ring Crimestoppers on 0800 555111.
